name: Orphanage
description: A home for children without families; adventurers can seek information from streetwise youths, uncover stories of lost heirs, or help improve the lives of the residents.
atmosphere: The orphanage has a bittersweet atmosphere with the sound of children playing and the scent of simple meals being prepared. The air carries the weight of lost families and the essential nature of care for the vulnerable, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of youthful resilience and the hope for better futures.
